task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 293°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: The top of the target building is not visible in the current view, so I need to tilt the camera upwards to see its full height before I can make an estimation.
I can now see the entire building from base to roof, and by counting the approximate number of floors (around 12) and assuming a standard floor height of 3.5 meters, I can estimate the total height.
